snippet: GUMLEY--Irwin. Henry Street Settlement mourns the loss of former Board Member, Irwin Gumley. We are deeply grateful for his kind support and leadership, and extend our thoughts to his family. David Garza, Executive Director and the Board of Henry Street Settlement. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GUMLEY--Irwin. Henry Street Settlement mourns the loss of former Board Member, Irwin Gumley. We are deeply grateful for his kind support and leadership, and extend our thoughts to his family. David Garza, Executive Director and the Board of Henry Street Settlement. 1/3
